shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Dawit “Psalter” (fols. 5r-146rb) I-1) Mäzmurä Dawit “Psalms of David” (fols. 5r-117r) I-2) Mäḥalǝyä näbiyat “The Canticles of the Prophets” (fols. 117v-128v) I-3) Mäḥalǝyä mäḥalǝy “Song of Songs” (fols. 129r-134v) I-4) Wǝddase Maryam “Praise of Mary” (fols. 135ra-142va) I-5) ʾAnqäṣä bǝrhan “The Gate of Light” (fols. 142va-146rb)
Additio 1.

donors.donor: According to Additio 1, the Ms. was donated by Ḫagos whose baptismal name is Zä-Mänfäs Qǝddus. He might be identified with the second son of däğğazmač Säbagadis (1770-1831), Ḫagos (d. 1831) whose baptismal name is Dagǝmawi Zä-Mänfäs Qǝddus. However, the note as well as the Ms. look more recent, so his donation should be considered with caution. Other Mss. donated by him are Ms. FBM-002 and AMM-004.

dcomments.dcomment: Early 19th cent. (?) Donation of the Ms. by däğğazmač Ḫagos and the dating should be considered with caution.

txstates.txstate: A few holes and tears amended on fols. 45, 57, 71.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards covered with moderate red tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bndecorations.bndecoration: Blind tooled ornament on the moderate red leather cover (at least 7 tools were used: triple line fillet, double circle, cross hatching, criss-cross, double crescent, wave form, romb form).

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible in the centre fold of the quires, close to the head and the tail of the codex.

txfolios.txfolio: (147+1) Foliation mistake: number 146 is repeated twice.

squires.squire: A(4/fols. 1r-4v) – I(10/fols. 5r-14v) – ፪II(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 8; 8, stub after 3/fols. 15r-24v) – ፫III(10/fols. 25r-34v) – ፬IV(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 7; 8, stub after 2/fols. 35r-44v) – ፭V(10/fols. 45r-54v) – ፮VI(10/fols. 55r-64v) – ፯VII(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 7; 8, stub after 2/fols. 65r-74v) – ፰VIII(10/fols. 75r-84v) – ፱IX(10/fols. 85r-94v) – ፲X(10/fols. 95r-104v) – ፲፩XI(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 7; 8, stub after 2/fols. 105r-114v) – ፲፪XII(10/fols. 115r-124v) – ፲፫XIII(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 8; 8, stub after 3/fols. 125r-134v) – [፲፬]XIV(10/fols. 135r-144v) – XV(4; s.l.: 2, stub after 3; 3, stub after 2/fols. 145r-147v).

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-1, I-2, I-3: all data are for fol. 6r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A/0-0/0-0/C. 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

taunit.mr-info: Texts I-4, I-5: all data for fol. 179r.
taunit.rl-info: Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are partly visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.

rubrications.rubrication:
Nomina sacra (name of God in Texts I-1 and I-2, name of St. Mary in Texts I-4 and I-5); titles and numbers of the Pss., Canticles and Songs; title of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-5; title and incipit of the daily readings of Text I-4; name and traditional interpretation of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118; letters ብ and ዎ in the word ስብሕዎ in Ps. 150; letters ባ, ክ and ዎ in the word ይባርክዎ and letter ስ in the abbreviation of the word ስቡሕኒ in Canticle 10; abbreviations for refrains of Texts I-4 and I-5; elements of the punctuation signs and of the text dividers; Ethiopic numerals or their elements.
Three groups of lines (alternating with black lines) on the incipit page of the group of ten Pss.; three groups of lines (alternating with black lines) on the incipit page of Texts I-2, I-3 and I-4; two lines (alternating with a black line) at the beginning of each Ps., Canticle and Song.

abbreviations.abbreviation: እስ᎓ for እስመ᎓ ለዓለም᎓ ምሕረቱ᎓ (Ps. 135, fol. 108r-v) ስቡ᎓ for ስቡሕኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ወልዑልኒ᎓ ውእቱ᎓ ለዓለም᎓ (Canticle 10, fol. 125r-126r) Text I-4 ሰ፤ ለ፤ ቅ፤ for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት ሰ፡ ቅድ for ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት (e.g., fol. 135vb) Words or their abbreviations stand for the whole refrain. ሠረ፡/ሠረቀ፡ for ሠረቀ፡ በሥጋ፡ እምድንግል፡ ዘእንበለ፡ ዘርአ፡ ብእሲ፡ ወአድኅነነ (fol. 135ra-vb) እስ፡/እስመ፡ for እስመ፡ በፈቃዱ፡ ወበሥምረቱ፡ አቡሁ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ መጽአ፡ ወአድኅነነ(fols. 135va -136vb) ኵ፡/ኵሉ፡ for ኵሉ፡ ትውልድ፡ ያስተበፅዑኪ፡ ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ(fols. 137ra-138rb) ናዓ፡ for ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ። እስመ፡ ሣህልኪ፡ ይኵን፡ ላዕለ፡ ኵልነ(fols. 138va-139vb) ለኪ፡ for ለኪ፡ ለበሕቲትኪ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ እመ፡ ብርሃን፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ በስብሐት፡ ወበውዳሴ (fol. 140rb) ተፈ፡ for ተፈሥሒ፡ ኦምልዕልተ፡ ጸጋ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እስመ፡ ረከብኪ፡ ሞገስ፡ ተፈሥሒ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ምስሌኪ (fol. 141rb-va) ወበ፡/ወበእንተዝ፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fols. 141vb-142va) Text I-5 ወል፡ ሣህ፡ ይክ፡ ሰአ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድ for ወልድኪ፡ ሣህሎ፡ ይክፍለነ፡ ሰአሊ፡ ለነ፡ ቅድስት (fols. 145ra-145vb) ወበእ፡/በእን፡ for ወበእንተዝ፡ ናዓብየኪ፡ ኵልነ፡ ኦእግዝእትነ፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ፡ ንጽሕት፡ ኵሎ፡ ጊዜ፡ ንስእል፡ ወናንቀዓዱ፡ ከመ፡ ንርከብ፡ ሣህለ፡ በኀበ፡ መፍቀሬ፡ ሰብእ (fols. 143vb-145va)

additional.add: Fol. 145v: ዘዋሀባ፡ [sic] ለማርያመፍቃዳ፡ በንዋይ፡ ዘመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ደዝማች፡ [sic] ሐጐስ፡ ከመትኩኖ፡ መርሐ፡ በሰማያት።
additional.det: The note is crudely written in pen. It states that the Ms. was donated by däğğazmač Ḥagwäs (Ḥagos) whose baptismal name is Zä-Mänfäs Qǝddus. A similar note is written in fontain pen on fol. 146rb. A short ownership note in the upper margin of fol. 135r mentions däğğazmač Ḥagos as well.

extras.extra: - The midpoint of the “Psalms of David” (in Ps. 77) is marked on fol. 63v. - The Pss. are divided into groups of ten separated by an ornamental band (s. Decoration). The division corresponds to the insertion of coloured threads (s. Finding aids). - The scribe reduced the size of the script to accommodate the end of the line: e.g., 6v, 11v, 35v, 109r, 124r, 129v. - Part of the line is taken up: e.g., fols. 40v, 110r, 125r. - Omitted passages inserted in smaller script: fols. 11r, 12v, 118r. - Omissiones inserted interlineally: fols. 46r, 51r, 81v, 106r, 123r. - Immediate corrections indicated by thin lines above and below words or indicated by a line encircling the words: e.g., fols. 57r, 102r, 113r. - Corrections written over erased words and passages, partly in a secondary hand: fols. 15v, 23v, 36v, 43v, 58r, 70v, 113v, 138vb, 141ra, 143ra: - Erasures marked with thin parallel lines: fols. 22r, 49r, 93r, 146r. - Drawing of a human face: fol. 7v. - School exercise (geography) in pencil: fol. 146rv. - Recent question marks: fols. 10v, 21v, 60r.

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Decorated quire marks are written in the upper margin of fols. 15r, 25r, 35r, 45r, 55r. 65r, 75r, 85r, 95r, 105r, 115r, 125r, 145r.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: Coloured threads inserted in the right upper corner of fols. 5r, 11r, 18r, 26r, 35r, 43r, 48r, 57r, 67r, 75r, 81, 92r, 103r, 106r, 111r, 117r, 129r (separating a group of 10 Pss., Mäḥalǝyä näbiyat, Mäḥalǝyä mäḥalǝy and Wǝddase Maryam).

frames.frame: Elaborate ornamental bands separating from each other groups of 10 Pss., Mäḥalǝyä näbiyat, Mäḥalǝyä mäḥalǝy and Wǝddase Maryam. 1) Fol. 5r: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet, dark grayish green and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces, floral and zoomorphic motifs and a crown. 2) Fol. 11v: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet, dark grayish green and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 3) Fol. 18v: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet, dark greenish gray and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 4) Fol.26r: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet, green and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 5) Fol. 35v: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet and dark grayish green) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 6) Fol. 43r: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 7) Fol. 48v: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 8) Fol. 57r: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet, dark grayish green and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 9) Fol. 67v: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet, dark grayish green and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 10) Fol. 75v: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet, dark grayish green and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 11) Fol. 81r: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces, floral motifs and a cross. 12) Fol. 92v: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces, floral and zoomorphic motifs. 13) Fol. 103r: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet and dark grayish green) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 14) Fol. 106r: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 15) Fol. 111v: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, light violet, dark grayish green and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 16) Fol. 117v: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, light violet, dark grayish green and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 17) Fol. 129r: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up and two pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs. 18) Fol. 135r: elaborate coloured (red, yellow, violet and blue) ornamental band with two lateral pendants pointed up, two pointed down and one extended pendant in the middle pointed down; interlaces and floral motifs.
